metadata.name: intro
metadata.description:
Day 1/31 of my Winter.Days project

For 31 days, i created a new track and a video everyday, voguing from one side of my universe to the other 

I thought about this project as a journal
Every piece is unique in its own way
From video recordings of my studio to texture and motion design i tried to showcase the full range of my art throughout this project 

1/31
WINTER.DAYS
ANDREALO
